Articles.Content:
Ignore the mistaken first name, I\'ve had a long day xD

But out of pure random luck rather than any skill, I launched a very basic rocket, aimed it mostly right and wholla, I end up with a Mun encounter xD

Could I get any tips on how to make a manual burn correction, when and where, to get into orbit?

When you get onto the yellow line- do a retroburn. That will begin to form an orbit around the Mun. Make sure you don\'t go sub orbital! Circularise your orbit by burning at the apoapsis/periapsis, and there you have an orbit! If you have enough fuel, you can now choose a good Mun landing site!
The craft is in the attached file
And thank-you very much for the info! I always try way to early to do a retro burn and mostly end up crashing or veering off and just making it back to Kerbin xD
